table.name: fieldautofill_mappings
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `fieldautofill_mappings` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `key` varchar(250) NULL , `primary` varchar(250) NULL , `secondary` varchar(250) NULL , `show_popup` int(1) NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) );

table.name: vte_modules
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vte_modules` ( `module` varchar(50) NOT NULL , `valid` int(1) NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`module`));
